description: Defines the validation results returned by the program when requested for program requirements
title: Program Validation Response Schema

_88validationResult.description: A result of validating a requirement
_88validationResult.title: Requirement Validation Result

___status.description: A status indicating whether the validation was successful or the severity of the error
___status.title: Validation Status

___message.description: A message indicating why the validation was successful or not
___message.title: Message

___longDescription.description: A more detailed description of why the validation was not successful and what can be done to resolve it
___longDescription.title: Long Description

___validationResults.description: A list of errors or success messages in response to validating the requirements
___validationResults.title: Validation Results

___key.description: The key of the requirement associated with the listed validation results
___key.title: Requirement Key

___results.description: The results associated with the validation requirement key
___results.title: Requirement Validation Results
